reference.title: MME support for IMEI and TAC/SV ranges (Feature f14620-01): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature enhances the current call processing algorithm for reading the IMSI range services relation to allow the IMEI type approval code (TAC)/software version (SV) matching (where the TAC is the type approval code within the IMEI).

li.ph: MME support for APN correction configuration enhancements for IMSI ranges (Feature f10107-07)

ul.li: MME support for active timer in the UE subscription (Feature f11732-01)

li.ph: MME support for configuration of eDRX and PSM parameters per APN and IMSI series (Feature f11721-01)
MME support for authentication frequency per IMSI range (Feature f10423-01)
MME support for CIoT feature control via IMSI ranges (Feature f11737-01)

entry.p: This feature applies only if the MSIN ranging and the TAI ranging is not provisioned within the same IMSI range services record.
In case that the UEâ€™s IMEI TAC does not match with any record of the IMEI TAC/SV list name, the IMEI is considered to be out of range.
